channel.title: [317] Need help with teleporting [317]
channel.description:
Can som1 tell me when i talk to an npc and he asks if i want to teleport somewhere and then it teles home.. :D
~Metal K0 ;)

item.title: [317] Need help with teleporting [317]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If you want the Npc to give you a choice of whether or not to teleport, you’re going to have to use dialogues. Now every server handles dialogues differently, but it should be something along these lines:

if(npcID == 50) {//King black dragon, but you know what I mean npc = NpcManager.getNpcByID(50); npc.sendDialogue(Npc.TALKING, 1, "Would you like me to teleport you to XXXX?", 2);//Emote to use, lines of text, text, next Dialogue number if the player clicks continue npc.sendOption(2, "Yes, please teleport me to XXXX", "No thank you."); if(player.selectedOption(1)) {//Wants to teleport player.teleportTo(XXXX, YYYY); } else { DialogueManager.clearChatbox(); } }

Or something like that.

Read full topic
